importantDates.title: TRB 2024: Submission Deadline
importantDates.description: Two papers derived from my MS Thesis and one from our progress in the R27-252 project are under preparation for submission to the next Transportation Research Board Annual Meeting.

importantDates.title: ISAP 2024: Submission Deadline
importantDates.description: A summary of the MS Thesis will be submitted for presentation only.

importantDates.title: Fall 2023: First Day of Classes
importantDates.description: Registered for CS 450 Numerical Analysis and CS 441 Applied Machine Learning.

importantDates.title: PhD Qualification Exam
importantDates.description: Date to be confirmed by the committee.

gradStudent.title: Becoming a Grad Student
gradStudent.text: After being awarded a Fulbright scholarship in 2020, I received guidance and support from Fulbright Peru and landed at the University of Illinois in the Fall of 2021 to pursue an MS in Civil Engineering. I joined the Illinois Center for Transportation shortly after, and became a PhD student in 2023.

affiliations.name: Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos
